author: Martin Crutsinger, Ap Economics Writer
title: Bernanke defending Fed actions to battle recession
text: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” Former Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke says the U.S. economy is outperforming Europe at the moment because the Fed moved more quickly and aggressively to fight the 2008 financial crisis than Europe did.
